importer.title: Import items from file
importer.warning: Importing from a file will delete already existing positions.

Process.Light.Import.Positions.InvalidFi.title: Invalid file format. Choose the file with the extension ".xlsx".
The file does not match the specification for the positions in the request. Download the actual template and upload it again.

Process.Light.Import.Positions.FileHasEr.title: Items with errors are not loaded. Correct the errors and upload again.
Process.Light.Import.Positions.FileHasEr.download: Download a file with error descriptions

empty.text: No additional columns have been added

documents.title: Allow attaching documents to a position
documents.text: Enabled option gives members the ability to attach documents to positions

tooltips.deviation: The field is available if the request parameter Supply volume will be set as Deviation allowed by positions and quantity
tooltips.target_price:
Specify the price, which will be a guide when choosing.
The price is displayed only to you - members will not see it.
tooltips.max_price:
The maximum price a supplier can offer for an item.
Supplier cannot exceed the specified price
tooltips.min_price:
The lowest price a supplier can offer for an item.
Supplier cannot offer a lower price
tooltips.expected_price:
The price per item expected from the supplier.
The customer expects a specified or lower price
